column4: under the breezy upgrade i got some problems, is there anyone that can help me?
in the breezy i did get a question about closing KDM that i answered yes on, and noe nothing works... someone that can help?
to restart kdm, try "sudo /etc/init.d/kdm restart"
it doesent start...
are you on a X session
no x does not start..
are you in a terminal? try startx and see if x starts?
command startx: command not found
that's weird, cause startx is supposed to be there
try reinstalling ubuntu-desktop package again
apt-get install --reinstall ubuntu-desktop
it might take a while
i get an message, with a list of many programs, an depends..
but the packages are probably already in the archives, so it won't take that much time
it does not begin to reinstall, i get an error or something
what error does it give you?
depends *** but it is not going to be installed
hmm..broken dependencies. apt-get -f install
now it is downloading :)
cool
errors were encountered while processing: postfix lsb-core lsb-graphics lsb-cxx lsb E sub process /etc/bin/dpkg returned with an error code (1)
i still cant reinstall ubumtu-desktop
